original: 吳郡富春人，東吳宗室。孫奐木訥寡言，但善於治軍。兄長孫皎死後，孫奐繼承了他的部曲和職務，任江夏太守、督夏口，與曹魏名將文聘相峙多年。
text: People from Fuchun in Wu Jun, Dongwu clan. Sun Huan was reluctant to speak, but was good at running the army. After the death of his elder brother Sun Jiao, Sun Huan inherited his trilogy and post, served as Jiangxia prefect and governor Xiakou, and confronted the famous general Wenpin Cao Wei for many years.
